name: rotki.dnp.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Accounting and analytics tool that protects your privacy
description:
Rotki is an open source portfolio tracker, accounting and analytics tool that protects your privacy.

Rotki offers tracking of all your crypto assets no matter where they are. Be it on a blockchain, a DeFi protocol or on one of the supported exchanges.

More information about the source project can be found at [their official website](https://rotki.com/)
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
